name: Colorful Tumblr Header
description: The primary function of this style is to change the color of the top banner on Tumblr. It can also change the colors of the border, fill, and icon of the header's compose button. Don't forget to choose your colors below!

user.name: Gabe Mitnick
user.about: Hi. My tumblr is at i-divided-by-zero.tumblr.com. If you have any suggestions for anything, email me at gabe.mitnick@gmail.com.
